com.group2.storm

Class Spout_Group2

  • java.lang.Object
    • backtype.storm.topology.base.BaseComponent
      • backtype.storm.topology.base.BaseRichSpout
        • com.group2.storm.Spout_Group2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    backtype.storm.spout.ISpout, backtype.storm.topology.IComponent, backtype.storm.topology.IRichSpout, java.io.Serializable

    public class Spout_Group2
extends backtype.storm.topology.base.BaseRichSpout

    ✔ In our Spout, we use API keys from the main class and query the twitter by using the keywords defined.
    ✔ we filter only English language tweets.
    Since:
    2020-05-08
    Version:
    2020.03
    Author:
    Syahirul Faiz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                    java.lang.String[] keyWords)

        ✔using Twitter API keys for authentication
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - Supply the Consumer Key for the Twitter API
        consumerSecret - Supply the Consumer Secret Key for the Twitter API
        accessToken - Supply the Access Token Key for the Twitter API
        accessTokenSecret - Supply the Access Token Secret Key for the Twitter API
        keyWords - The keyword passed from the Topology.java
